alert.note: Alert for Cass (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 30 at 10:25PM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 415 AM EDT SATURDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...A portion of southwest Michigan, including the following county, Cass MI. * WHEN...Until 415 AM EDT. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1024 PM EDT, Doppler radar indicated slow moving thunderstorms with very heavy rainfall across the warned area. Between 2.5 and 4 inches of rain have fallen. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Adamsville. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
